name: The Maw of Malphas
description:
The Maw of Malphas is a platformer game about a carrion crow in a strange situation.

CONTROLS:

Q or X to glide.

E or C to dash.

A and D or arrows keys to move left and right.

Spacebar or Z to jump.

Gamepad accessible, however, I play tested almost exclusively using keyboard.

Hold R to die, and hold ESC to quit to main menu.

Please let me know what you think.
